title: Retina Repair
description: One method of retinal detachment repair is pneumatic retinopexy. In this procedure, a gas bubble is injected into the eye.

title: Glaucoma
description: Glaucoma is an acquired optic neuropathy in which destruction of ganglion cells and fibers leads to irreversible visual field loss.

title: Dry Eye Surgery
description: When this little gland is out of whack it can cause a range of problems. Learn more today. Learn about the phases of thyroid eye disease.

title: Cornea Transplant
description: A cornea transplant is an operation to remove all or part of a damaged cornea and replace it with healthy donor tissue.

title: Surgical Procedure
description: The act of performing surgery may be called a surgical procedure, operation, or simply surgery.

title: Laser Surgery
description: Laser surgery is a type of surgery that uses special light beams instead of instruments for surgical procedures.

title: Cornea Care

title: Eye Infection
description: An eye infection can happen when bacteria, viruses or fungi invade part of the eye or its surrounding area.
